A

allVowels(String) - Static method in class Pig
Returns String of all vowels in a String.

B

beginsWithVowel(String) - Static method in class Pig
Checks whether a String begins with a vowel
Pre: w != null
Post: boolean value of whether or not the String begins with a vowel

C

countVowels(String) - Static method in class Pig
Counts vowels in a String
pre: w != null
post: returns the integer amount of vowels in the word

E

engToPig(String) - Static method in class Pig
This method uses the single word translator, engToPigMain, and makes it compatible with hyphonated words.
engToPigMain(String) - Static method in class Pig
This method is the primary translation method.

F

firstVowel(String) - Static method in class Pig
Returns the first vowel in a String
pre: w != null
post: first vowel returned

H

hasA(String, String) - Static method in class Pig
This method checks whether a letter is in a String
pre: w != null, letter.length() == 1
post: returns boolean of whether letter is in a string
hasAVowel(String) - Static method in class Pig
Checks whether a String has a vowel in it
pre: w != null
post: returns boolean of whether the String has a vowel in it

I

isAVowel(String) - Static method in class Pig
Checks whether a letter is a vowel
pre: letter.length() == 1
post: returns boolean of whether letter is a vowel
isPunc(String) - Static method in class Pig
Checks whether a character is punctuation
pre: letter.length() == 1
post: returns boolean of whether letter is a vowel

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Pig
 

P

Pig - Class in <Unnamed>
Class Pig is a pig latin translation class.
